name: CrossyRift
description:
CrossyRift

CrossyRift started as a school project made by a group of 6 people in 10 weeks. It dreams to be the Crossy Road for pc, featuring VR support, a completely custom made art style, and much more to come. It's not just crossyroad, it's only based on the concept.

CrossyRift is build in the Unreal engine, so we don't have to worry about any power needed for development.

The ongoing development of the game is not specified yet, but we'll let you know as soon as we know :)

Let us know what you think, what you would like to see, what you don't like at all, the bugs, EVERYTHING. Trust me, we need it.Some Important Stuff
  • CROSSYRIFT IS NOT FINISHED! You will encounter bugs, game crashes and some unexpected stuff. The game does not have any finished form of gameplay, but we're working on it. Meanwhile, just hop around a bit and have fun, that's the most important.
Controls

-Use the mouse or your oculus rift to look around, and press W to move in that direction. You are tied to a grid, so moving diagonally is not possible.

-Press P to go to the main menu. WARNING: there is no pauze feature yet, so you will lose your score.

-Press Q to quit the game.

EDIT:

As of 20-2-2016, the development of crossyrift has been paused. This because I am working on a new project which I hope to release a demo of shortly.

Thanks to al the supporters of this game. I love you guys!
